Texts.Name: Name
Texts.AreYouSureToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Texts.BookDeletionConfirmationMessage: Are you sure to delete the book '{0}'?
Texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information visit
Texts.QuestionCountHelpText: Here you can set how many questions you need to solve per day. Remember, you can only solve as many questions in a day as you set here!
Texts.WordDeletionConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the word '{0}'?
Texts.WordSampleDeletionConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the example '{0}'?
Texts.ErrorLoadingWordSamples: An error occurred while loading word samples
Texts.WelcomeBackMessage: Continue learning English with our vocabulary exercises. Track your progress and improve your skills with spaced repetition.
Texts.HowToUseDescription: Follow these simple steps to enhance your English vocabulary effectively.
Texts.Step1_AddWords: Add words to your personal collection
Texts.Step2_TakeQuiz: Take daily quizzes to practice your vocabulary
Texts.Step3_SpacedRepetition: Review words based on spaced repetition system
Texts.SpacedRepetitionDescription: Our app uses a scientifically proven method to help you remember words long-term. Words will automatically reappear for review at optimal intervals.
Texts.Benefit1: Learn words faster with visual cues and context
Texts.Benefit2: Remember vocabulary longer with strategic repetition
Texts.Benefit3: Track your progress and focus on what needs improvement
Texts.AddWordsDescription: Build your personalized vocabulary collection. Add English words with Turkish translations and even images to help you remember them better.
Texts.QuizDescription: Test your knowledge with our adaptive quiz system. The questions adapt to your learning progress, focusing on words you need to practice most.
Texts.SettingsDescription: Personalize your learning experience. Set your daily study goals and adjust other preferences to match your learning style.
Texts.YouHaveCompletedAllQuestions: You have successfully completed all the questions for this session.
Texts.ContinueLearningMessage: Continue practicing daily to improve your vocabulary retention. Words will reappear according to the spaced repetition schedule.
Texts.PdfSuccessMessage: PDF report has been generated successfully
Texts.PdfErrorMessage: There was an error generating the PDF report
Texts.EnglishApp_Subtitle: Improve your vocabulary with our spaced repetition system. Learn faster, remember longer.
Texts.SpacedRepetition_Description: Our scientifically proven system helps you learn words at the perfect time, just before you're about to forget them.
Texts.ProgressTracking_Description: Monitor your learning journey with detailed statistics and visualizations of your improvement over time.
Texts.FunLearning_Description: Enjoy learning with engaging quizzes and a gamified experience that keeps you motivated.
Texts.Step1_Description: Start by adding words you want to learn to your personal dictionary.
Texts.Step2_Description: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes designed to reinforce your memory.
Texts.Step3_Description: Our system automatically schedules reviews based on your performance to optimize retention.
Texts.Testimonial1_Text: This app has transformed how I learn English. The spaced repetition system is incredibly effective!
Texts.Testimonial2_Text: I've tried many language learning apps, but this one stands out with its personalized approach and easy interface.
Texts.ReadyToStart_Description: Join thousands of users who are already improving their English vocabulary with our application.
